thread.title: The best marine adventures to experience before you die
thread.title_full: The best marine adventures to experience before you die

author: Telegraph Staff
title: The best marine adventures to experience before you die
text:
From tracking the sardine run to diving in the South Pacific, Monty Halls identifies 11 unmissable experiences at sea 
-- 
The sardine run 
Billions of sardines enter the warm waters of South Africa's Wild Coast each year from May to July. It is one the worldâ€™s great natural events, representing more biomass than the wildebeest migrations across the Serengeti, and the sheer numbers create a feeding frenzy involving at least 18,000 dolphins, circling Cape gannets, sharks galore, and several species of whale. Read more from Monty Halls about this year's sardine run . Picture: AP/FOTOLIA
